alert.note: Alert for Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 1:04PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Brunswick and east central Columbus Counties through 145 PM EDT... At 104 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Makatoka, or 13 miles north of Shallotte, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Lake Waccamaw, Makatoka, Freeland, Freeman, Honey Island, Old Dock, Delco, Exum, Crusoe Island, Riegelwood, Bolton and Sandy Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for southeastern North Carolina.
